data.title: Radim Řehůřek : Hearst Corporation
data.text:
Overview

Hearst Corporation is one of the largest diversified communications companies in the world. Its major interests include 15 daily and 36 weekly newspapers and more than 300 magazines worldwide, including Harper’s Bazaar, Cosmopolitan, Esquire, Elle, and O, The Oprah Magazine; 29 television stations through Hearst Television, Inc., which reach a combined 18% of U.S. viewers; ownership in leading cable networks, including A+E Networks, and ESPN Inc.; as well as business publishing, digital distribution, television production, newspaper features distribution, and real estate ventures.

Who, where, when

During 2014 and 2015, our company has worked with Hearst Corporation on an automated content discovery, consolidation and categorization system, using AWS, Spark and Python.

The system details are not public.

Reference contact:

Eugene Istrati, Director of Engineering, Hearst.

Services

Machine Learning / Semantic Analysis

Project details
